subject: Re: [junit] how to test System.loadLibrary(String)
msgSnippet: ... Did you try writing a test? Was it good enough? If not, then what do you want to test that you couldn t already test? Good luck. J. B. Rainsberger,
messageBody:
>So said Mukund Patel on 2003-05-06 --------------------
>How to test System.loadLibrary(String) function using JUnit.

Did you try writing a test? Was it good enough? If not, then what do you want to test that you couldn't already test?

Good luck.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
